A Souvenir of the Opera
Coach House Inn, Bentham, North Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£1.10s.) Earby, 2nd (£1) Haworth Public, 3rd (10s.)Leyland Subscription. 7 bands competed.
